TopicTitle: Changing RCS to use Liquid Fuel

Articles.Content: From memory, multi-directional bipropellant RCS is not something KSP supports.
Well dang it! That is disappointing.
If you're modding, [ModuleRCSFX](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92290-0-24-2-ModuleRCSFX-v3-0-8-29-14) includes support for such things.
Ok cool, I wondered if that mod could help. I'll try it out. Thanks for the help.
